articles.content:

 The sight of the individual out walking in a plague doctor outfit has provoked mixed reactions

articles.author: Andrew Hough, Daniel Wills
articles.title: Barossa lockdowns lifted, six days with no new cases, Home Hospital program to expand - The Advertiser
articles.description: More at-risk South Australians will be cared for at home as an official out-of-hospital program is “industrialised” on Wednesday after it helped treat coronavirus patients amid a sixth consecutive day of zero cases.
articles.content:
More at-risk South Australians will be cared for at home as an official out-of-hospital program is industrialised on Wednesday after it helped treat coronavirus patients amid a sixth consecutive day of zero cases.

articles.author: Kashmira Gander
articles.title: Ruptured Heart Caused First COVID-19 Death in U.S., Autopsy States - Newsweek
articles.description: Patricia Dowd, 57, died on February 6.
articles.content:
A California woman who is thought to be the first person to die of COVID-19 in the U.S. suffered a ruptured heart, according to an autopsy report.
Patricia Dowd, 57, died on February 6, 2020, the report exclusively obtained by the San Francisco Chronicle sta… [+6868 chars]
